metadata.dc:author: Devesa Múgica, M
Carpintero Saiz, M L
Prieto Gómez, O
López Lobato, M
Selas Pérez, A
Troncoso Suárez, A
metadata.dc:description: The etiology as well as clinical and diagnostic features of eosinophilic cystitis are reviewed establishing their differential diagnosis with different ways of eosinophilic infiltration in a vesical location.
metadata.dc:title: Cistitis eosinofílica.
[Eosinophilic cystitis].
